data.title: Are Rihanna and Chris Brown working on a song together?
data.meta_description: E! News is reporting that Rihanna and boyfriend Chris Brown are in California working on a song for Brown’s next CD. data.text:
E! News is reporting that Rihanna and boyfriend Chris Brown are in California working on a song for Brown’s next CD.

A source was said to have told the celebrity news site that Brown and Rihanna are working together on a track that will be featured on Chris Brown’s upcoming album.

“They’ve been working on it together,” a studio source told E! News.

The song is allegedly being produced by Polow Da Don and Adonis Shropshire. The two producers have reportedly been joined by Brown and Rihanna in a studio in Santa Monica, California for several days now.
